short_summary: Standing offer for asbestos and mold abatement services, initially awarded to a supplier for services on the lands within Canadian Forces Base Shilo in Manitoba.
description: The department wishes to establish a regional individual standing offer for the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision and material necessary for the inspection, testing, sampling, air monitoring and/or removal of asbestos materials from various buildings within Canadian Forces Base Shilo, Manitoba.
full_summary:
# W6896-23S055 – Standing Offer for Asbestos and Mold Abatement Services

## Tender Details

* **Contract Reference Number:** WS4055141766
* **Tender Address**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
	+ Contact: Christopher Lau, christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: July 10th, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: Not applicable (standing offer)
* **Procurement Category**: Canada Lands Trust ( CNST)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and material necessary for the inspection, testing, sampling, air monitoring, and/or removal of asbestos materials from various buildings at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shilo, Manitoba.

## Amendment Information

The tender closing time has been updated. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 10th, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Notice Information

To access the tender notice, please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16664371?extsite=MTY2NjQzNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16664371?extsite=MTY2NjQzNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

## Trade Agreements and Regions

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

## Tender Status

* **Status:** Cancelled (no bids to be accepted)

This revised tender announcement aims to clearly communicate the necessary information to potential bidders in a professional and concise manner. I have excluded extraneous details to keep the response within the 400-word limit.
